text: Hey team, looking to work with James Wilson for Fantastic Furniture. Budget is approx $3,025 - need 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 2 x Instagram post, 2 x 90-second product demo, 2 x Twitter post, 3 x Instagram post. 12 weeks exclusivity, 2 month engagement. Usage: 6 months. Start date: January 2026. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $3,025 budget
